# ChunkAttribute constructor

Chunk classes must be decorated with this attribute to indicate the chunk type.

```csharp
public ChunkAttribute(string chunkTypeLabel)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| chunkTypeLabel | The chunk type label. |

## Remarks

Classes decorated with this attribute must also have a parameterless constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the [`ChunkAttribute`](../ChunkAttribute.md) class.
